parameters.OK Help: Used to accept menu actions and talk to people
parameters.Shift Help: Hold this button to dash on the field

name: KeyboardConfig
description:
v1.00 Allows players to adjust their button configuration
for keyboards.

parameters.Key Help: Change the configuration of this key?
parameters.Default Help: Reverts your keyboard setting to the default setup.
parameters.WASD Help: Changes your keyboard to WASD movement.
parameters.Finish Help: Are you done configuring your keyboard?
